replies.body: They announced the gamemodes schedule this week smh. Maybe people need to read updates so there won't be spam on Boards with URF {{sticker:slayer-jinx-unamused}}

Chill. You get urf next weekend. 
It is also going to be coming out more than once this year, so keep your eyes peeled!
urf is next weekend i'm pretty sure.
It was announced that we'd have LOTPK over this weekend (and that we'd get URF over next weekend) a week ago (last Friday). There is no reason to be surprised that we don't have URF this weekend.
